contents.content: UNIT 01 求职准备 Job Hunting Preparation
Lesson 2 收集职位信息 Collecting Position Information
杰克和玛丽在谈论收集到的招聘信息。

contents.title: 杰克：嗨，玛丽，我决定要找一份销售的工作。
contents.answer: Jack: Hi, Mary, I have decided to look for a job as a salesman.

contents.title: 玛丽：好啊！那你找到有关销售的招聘信息了吗？
contents.answer: Mary: Good! Have you got the recruitment information on marketing?

contents.title: 杰克：是的，我通过不同渠道找了好几个有关销售的招聘信息。
contents.answer: Jack: Yes. I have found some through different channels.

contents.title: 玛丽：是吗？太好了！快点说来听听。
contents.answer: Mary: Really? That's great! Tell me.

contents.content: 收集职位信息也是求职过程中一个很重要的环节。求职者在确定自己的求职意向后，就会通过各种渠道收集职位信息。在最短的时间内获取最有效的职位信息，有助于求职者尽快找到理想的工作。

contents.title: 杰克：好的。我在网上找到一个职位信息，关于药品销售的。
contents.answer: Jack: OK. The first piece of job information I got was from the Internet, and it is about selling medicines.

contents.title: 玛丽：你感觉怎么样？
contents.answer: Mary: What do you think of this job?

contents.title: 杰克：我不了解药品行业，觉得这个工作不太适合我。
contents.answer: Jack: I am not familiar with the medicine industry, and I don't think it fits me well.

contents.title: 玛丽：那么其他的呢？
contents.answer: Mary: Then how about the others?

contents.title: 杰克：还有一个是做电子商务的，主要销售大型机械设备。
contents.answer: Jack: Another is about electronic commerce, and its products are mainly large machinery equipments.

contents.title: 玛丽：我听说过电子商务，好多人都说挺有发展前景的。
contents.answer: Mary: I have heard about electronic commerce, and many people say it has good prospects for development.

contents.title: 杰克：我也感觉这个比较不错，我想去试试。
contents.answer: Jack: I also feel it's nice. I want to give it a try.

contents.title: 玛丽：加油！我相信你一定会成功的。
contents.answer: Mary: Come on! I believe you will succeed.

contents.title: 杰克：谢谢你，不如你也从网上找找招聘信息吧。
contents.answer: Jack: Thanks. You can also seek job information on the Internet.

contents.title: 玛丽：好主意，我会好好考虑的。
contents.answer: Mary: Good idea. I will think it over.

contents.content: 尽管收集信息的途径很广泛，但是并不是所有的信息都是真实有效的。有些人会利用招聘渠道弄虚作假，欺骗求职者。因此，求职者在搜索招聘信息时，要尽可能选择一些比较可靠的方式，以保证安全求职。

contents.title: 1.我在网上找到了大量的招聘信息。
contents.answer: I found a lot of recruitment information on the Internet.

contents.title: 2.我在报纸上看到了一则招聘教师的信息。
contents.answer: I saw a piece of teacher recruitment information in the newspaper.

contents.title: 3.电视上每天都会播报不同的招聘信息。
contents.answer: The TV broadcasts different job information every day.

contents.title: 4.收集招聘信息有不同的途径。
contents.answer: There are different ways to collect job information.

contents.title: 5.我经常去招聘会寻找招聘信息。
contents.answer: I often go to job fairs to look for job information.

contents.title: 6.我通常会收集各行各业的职位招聘信息。
contents.answer: I usually collect job information about various trades and professions.

contents.title: 7.我在面试前会先大量收集职位招聘信息。
contents.answer: I will collect lots of job information before the interview.

contents.title: 8.收集职位招聘信息是求职的一个重要部分。
contents.answer: Collecting job information is an important part of job-hunting.

contents.title: 9.大量收集招聘信息可以增加你求职成功的机率。
contents.answer: Collecting job information extensively will increase the probability of success in job-hunting.

contents.title: 10.收集职位信息的过程也是了解企业情况的过程。
contents.answer: The process of collecting job information is also a process of getting to know about the company situations.
